Package ca.concordia.risk.controller

Class ConsoleViewHandler

java.lang.Object
ca.concordia.risk.controller.ConsoleViewHandler
public class ConsoleViewHandler
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles the view and model class values for the same following the observer pattern

Karan

    • phaseDecider

      public java.lang.String phaseDecider​(java.lang.String inputCommand)
      This method handles the input passed from the console and calling appropriate phase method from model and other controller classes
      Parameters:
      inputCommand - String of command passed from Console
      Returns:
      errorFlag indicating valid or invalid command and phase flow
